title: Darkstream: AH:Q 2.0 update
author: VD
content_html: Watch the Darkstream. The upshot is that we anticipate launching the Alt-Hero: Q 2.0 campaign on Monday. We expect to use one site, but we have an alternative as a backup ready in case we encounter any problems launching on the first one.
content_text:
Watch
the Darkstream
. The upshot is that we anticipate launching the Alt-Hero: Q 2.0 campaign on Monday. We expect to use one site, but we have an alternative as a backup ready in case we encounter any problems launching on the first one.
